verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> things offered unto <S%G1494>idols,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge.<s%> <S%G1108>Knowledge<s%> puffeth <S%G5448>up,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G3618>edifieth.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> that he <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> any <S%G5100>thing,<s%> he <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G1097>know.<s%>

As <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1035>eating<s%> of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto <S%G1494>idols,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> an <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> there is <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1520>one.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> there is but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> there is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G1108>knowledge:<s%> <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> with <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1497>idol<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> this <S%G737>hour<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> it <S%G5613>as<s%> a thing offered unto an <S%G1494>idol;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%> is <S%G3435>defiled.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G3936>commendeth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3777>neither,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat,<s%> are we the <S%G4052>better;<s%> <S%G3777>neither,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> are we the <S%G5302>worse.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> lest by any <S%G3381>means<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>liberty<s%> of <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G4348>stumblingblock<s%> to them that are <S%G770>weak.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> which <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> sit at <S%G2621>meat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the idol's <S%G1493>temple,<s%> shall <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%> be <S%G3618>emboldened<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> those things which are offered to <S%G1494>idols;<s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1355><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> make my brother to <S%G4624>offend,<s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80><s%> I will <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2907>flesh<s%> while the world <S%G1519>standeth,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> I make my brother to <S%G4624>offend.<s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80><s%>
